page.title: 01Shillington 1
page.content:
Shillington is a village of some 2000 inhabitants. Its centre is clustered around the grand, historic church with its partly renovated buttresses reflecting their shiny newness in the sun. Money is still being raised to complete the job, which is scheduled to take another two years and to cost #90 000.
At the time of writing, there is no parish priest and during the interregnum, lay people are attending to the Pastoral care of the village. The Bishop of Bedford will collate Father Dennis Morgan to the benefice on November 27th. 1985.
